author: desruisseaux
msg: Ported the ServiceIdentification test from Geotk, and fixed XML bugs in this process.

author: markt
msg: Allow the JNDI Realm to start even if the directory is not available. The directory not being available is not fatal once the Realm is started and it need not be fatal when the Realm starts. Based on a patch by Cédric Couralet.

author: markt
